actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the standards used for determining whether individuals are not employees.
short_title: Independent Contractor Tax Simplification Act of 1998

summary.text: Independent Contractor Tax Simplification Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set forth standards for determining whether individual service providers are not employees.

titles.title: Independent Contractor Tax Simplification Act of 1998
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the standards used for determining whether individuals are not employees.
